prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of a very lean and muscular young woman, tanned skin, short black spiky hair, large determined eyes, wearing a red crop top and matching skirt, athletic build
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, cinematic dramatic lighting, extreme muscle definition, visible veins on arms and abdomen, photorealistic skin texture, detailed hair strands, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, overly bulky muscles, smooth skin, doll, flat lighting, low quality, blurry hair, exaggerated features
